snippet: Three new books are studies in power through the prisms of anarchy, the New York Yankees and the Broadway stage.
abstract: Sam Roberts reviews books More Powerful Than Dynamite: Radicals, Plutocrats, Progressives and New York's Year of Anarchy by Thai Jones, Pinstripe Empire: The New York Yankees From Before the Babe to After the Boss by Marty Appel and Mr Broadway: The Inside Story of the Shuberts, the Shows and the Stars by Gerald Schoenfeld.
lead_paragraph: Three new books are studies in power through the prisms of anarchy, the New York Yankees and the Broadway stage.

headline.seo: Books on the Power of Anarchy, the Yankees and Broadway
